attributes.action: change the law to allow residents of this country to legally hold firearms for self protection since the law courts have been negated by the rule that anonymous evidence against organised criminals is illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There will be no future trials against criminal members of organised crime gangs because of the threat of retribution for giving evidence.  There is no way the police can guarantee public safety because the organisation itself is as corrupt as the criminal gangs.  As a result the innocent public are to be left at the hands of criminals who cannot be prosecuted.  We must, therefore, be given the option of being able protect ourselves in the prospective upsurge of crime against the person these new law lords rulings will invoke.
